titleStmt.title: Various Accounts; List of Names
titleStmt.author: Unknown scribe, working for the komogrammateus Petaus

msContents.summary: Recto, col. I: account of expenses; col. II: account of income and expenses, and of money owed. - Verso: first an addition (of money or people?), then a list of names

msItemStruct.note: Archive of Petaus, son of Petaus, komogrammateus of Ptolemais Hormou

condition.ab: Damaged along some folds and at the edges

origin.origPlace: Probably Ptolemais Hormou, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Ischyrion son of Heraklas (see P.Petaus, p. 172)
(Polemon alias) Laberis son of Pholemis (see P.Petaus 93)

provenance.p: Probably either Karanis or Ptolemais Hormou, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: (Recto, col. I);;To the president: 300 <drachmai>;to the slaves: 2 <drachmai>;to Nikias: 10 <drachmai>;to the meniarchai: 18 <drachmai>;for garlands: 2 <drachmai>;to the assistant of the accounting-office: 2 <drachmai>;for 3 ch(--): 4 <drachmai>;to the one who conveys (things): 4 <drachmai>;to the door-keeper: 1 <drachme>;;(Recto, col. II);;Through Lucullus: 440<drachmai>;and through Diodoros: 20 <drachmai>;and through Komon, in the city: 16 <drachmai>;total: 476 <drachmai>;of which:;to the president: 300 <drachmai>;to Nikias: 40 <drachmai>;to the slaves of the president: 8 <drachmai>;for 3 ch(--): 16 <drachmai>;for garlands: 4 <drachmai>;Total: 368 <drachmai>;Remain with them: 108 <drachmai>;Aes owes:;to the meniarchai: 184 <drachmai>;to the one who conveys (things): 16 <drachmai>;to the assistant of the accounting-office: 8 <drachmai>;to the (assistant) of the actuarius: 8 <drachmai>;to the door-keeper: 4 <drachmai>;for salary: 120 <drachmai>;Total: 340 <drachmai>;;(Verso);;(2nd hand) [. + . +] 3 [+ ? + .] + 3 + 5 [+ ?] + 2 + 10 + 5 + 5 + 4 + 5 +3 + 5 + 4 + 9 + 9 + 16 + 4 +3 + 10 + 6 + 7 + 3 + 2 + 5 + [.] + 5 + 3 + [.] + 3;Total: 18[*];602 drachmai + 42(?). Total: 644 drachmai;(1st hand) Aphrodas, son of Pnepheros;Pantonymos, son of P[.]kt[.]nbios;Eudas, donkey-driver;Ischyrion, son of Heraklas;Heron, his brother;Kynar[- - -];Laberis, son of Pholemis;Kephalas, son of Heraklas;Aphrod(--), barber;Ploos
